name: Marauders Rift
description:
A classic spaceship arcade game.

When a rift opens above the earth, a fleet of pilots is sent to investigate,  soon to discover the threat from the Star Marauders.

An Arcade game of frantic action and strategy,  use your skill to defend yourself from marauding hordes,  dodge lasers and missiles in a good classic spaceship game.

Extremely simple commands, tap where the ship should go and double click to release an atomic missile.
